lexUnit.name: inspector.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an official who ensures that regulations are obeyed.

sentence.text: Queen Victoria appointed him Inspector of Fisheries , and he took his job seriously , persuading millers to install salmon ladders over their weirs .
